<meta name="description" content="The physics of great design is a mix of both art and science, and as a visual medium, rooted in aesthetics. This makes it hard to put a philosophy into words, but we gave it a try and have found it to be really provocative when we speak with potential clients" />
<meta name="robots" content="index, follow, max-snippet:-1, max-image-preview:large, max-video-preview:-1" />

<meta property="og:title" content="The Physics of Great Design" />
<meta property="og:description" content="The physics of great design is a mix of both art and science, and as a visual medium, rooted in aesthetics. yoast_head_json.description: The physics of great design is a mix of both art and science, and as a visual medium, rooted in aesthetics. This makes it hard to put a philosophy into words, but we gave it a try and have found it to be really provocative when we speak with potential clients
